welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.title: Welcome Message Config
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_on: If the mod should only run on dedicated servers. When enabled it's not sent when in a singleplayer world.
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_se: Whether an empty line should be send before to first message to separate the welcome from other chat messages that might be sent.
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.sendEmp: Send Empty Line Before First Message
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_me: The first message a player will receive when joining the world. Can be left empty.
0: black, 1: dark_blue, 2: dark_green, 3: dark_aqua, 4: dark_red, 5: dark_purple, 6: gold, 7: gray, 8: dark_gray, 9: blue, 10: green, 11: aqua, 12: red, 13: light_purple, 14: yellow, 15: white
If a link is entered here, the complete message will be clickable.
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.message: Message One Optional U R L
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_me: The second message a player will receive when joining the world. Can be left empty.
0: black, 1: dark_blue, 2: dark_green, 3: dark_aqua, 4: dark_red, 5: dark_purple, 6: gold, 7: gray, 8: dark_gray, 9: blue, 10: green, 11: aqua, 12: red, 13: light_purple, 14: yellow, 15: white
If a link is entered here, the complete message will be clickable.
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.message: Message Two Optional U R L
welcomemessage-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_me: The third message a player will receive when joining the world. Can be left empty.
